supersnek

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • supersnek.ContainsObject
      • supersnek.Moveable
        • supersnek.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstrainedToArea, KeyHandler, Removable, Tickable

    public class Snake
extends Moveable
implements KeyHandler, ConstrainedToArea, Tickable
    Snake - contains SnakePiece, main object in the game
    Author:
    Noah Overcash (smileytechguy@smileytechguy.com)
